title: Backend Development Suite
description: Full-featured backend development environment combining architecture planning, database design, and cloud services integration. Perfect for building scalable server-side applications.
author: JSONbored
useCases: Building new backend services from scratch

items.reason: Designs scalable backend architectures and system designs
Provides expert database design and optimization guidance
Integrates AWS cloud services for infrastructure management

troubleshooting.issue: Multiple agents provide conflicting architectural recommendations
troubleshooting.solution: Install backend-architect-agent first to establish system design. Database and API agents will follow architectural decisions. Enable only one agent at a time when designing new components.

troubleshooting.issue: AWS MCP server version incompatible with agent-generated code
troubleshooting.solution: Verify aws-services-mcp-server supports AWS SDK v3. Check package.json for @aws-sdk version compatibility with generated code. Update MCP server to latest version matching SDK requirements.

troubleshooting.issue: Database agent schema conflicts with API Builder endpoints
troubleshooting.solution: Follow installationOrder: install database-specialist-agent before api-builder-agent. Database agent sets schema first, API agent generates compatible endpoints matching established design.

troubleshooting.issue: Missing AWS credentials prevent MCP server initialization
troubleshooting.solution: Configure AWS credentials first: run aws configure or set AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID and AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY. Verify with aws sts get-caller-identity then install aws-services-mcp-server.

troubleshooting.issue: Collection items require different Node.js versions
troubleshooting.solution: All items require Node 18+. Verify with node --version before installation. Use nvm to switch versions: nvm use 18. Reinstall entire collection after activating correct Node version.
